ActionPlanTemplateAssignment.name: ActionPlanTemplateAssignment
ActionPlanTemplateAssignment.description: Represents a junction between an action plant template's version and the target object associated with them.

ActionPlanTemplateVersionId.description: Required. The ActionPlanTemplateVersion associated with the TargetObject.

AssociatedObjectId.description: Required. Represents the relation between an object associated with the action plan template version record.

IsApplicable.description: Indicates whether the action plan template assignment applies to the reference record (true) or not (false).

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the action plan template assignment is required (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The unique ID of the Action Plan Template Assignment.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the action plan template assignment.

TemplateDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the action plan template within the context of the reference record.
